snippet.title: Hazard | New Hero Gameplay Trailer | Overwatch 2
snippet.description:
Bring some rebellion to the battlefield with Hazard!

Overwatch 2’s newest Hero is a brawl dive Tank who thrives on mobility, disruption, and anarchy for the greater good.

As a member of the Phreaks, Hazard’s revolutionary spirit fuels his fight against the status quo, and his body modifications enhance his abilities, making him more adaptable and disruptive in any team fight.

Give Hazard a go during his limited-time trial NOW through Nov 25 before he officially arrives in Season 14.

Overwatch 2 is free to play for everyone on console & PC!
_
Follow #Overwatch2 for the latest news:
